correspondence.message: I am a BSc student at TUM and want to participate in the course on Autonomous Navigation for Flying Robots. However, I am unable to contact the instructor responsible for this course. Could you please assist me?"

The course IN2318 is offered irregularly and was last held in the summer semester of 2021. It is likely not going to be offered in the upcoming winter semester. You may want to explore other courses with interesting topics.
